attributes.action: Government Intervention To Ensure Daniel Bryan Gets A WWE Title Shot At WrestleMania XXX
attributes.additional_details:
The White House has closed a petition created by American citizens that called for Daniel Bryan to be granted a shot at the WWE World Heavyweight Championship at WrestleMania XXX.

We are calling for parliament to agree that international action is necessary, and to ensure that out government intervenes in this absolute travesty.
